English: Allows taking items on the ground even on missions where area not secured.
Allows scanning for nearby POIs, revealing havens and shows pings of stationary Pandorans (Sentinels, Hatchery) in mission.
More range and detects Pandoran colonies
Heals vehicles and bionics in flight, allows augmenting during flight, also restores their stamina
Less Mist on missions and no automatic +1 Delirium
Boosts initial stealth of all deployed operatives (+50 stealth during first 2 turns)
Extra WP (+3?) on Mission start in open air missions
Carry up to 2 mutogs for 1 space each, so can deploy 2 mutogs and 6 operatives
Heals mutagen-based creatures and allows mutating during flight, also recovers their stamina
Doubles speed buff when traveling in Mist
Slowly recovers Stamina and Health of characters on board
